cmd.clans.create.error.name.format: <red>The clan name must be alphanumeric and between 2 and 24 characters.

cmd.clans.info.not-found: <red>No clan or player with the given name exists.
cmd.clans.nexus.error.invalid: <red>The nexus must be placed in an empty area.
cmd.clans.nexus.error.too.close: <red>The nexus cannot be placed this close to another nexus or region.
protection.nexus.build.too-close: <red>You cannot build this close to a nexus.
attack.error.wrong-nexus: <red>You can only attack the nexus of a clan you are at war with.
